com.conceptwave.scripting
Class MetadataFinderView

com.conceptwave.scripting.Object
  com.conceptwave.scripting.CWScriptable
      com.conceptwave.scripting.MetadataIdentity
          com.conceptwave.scripting.MetadataFinderView

public class MetadataFinderView
extends MetadataIdentity

A finder view specifies one distinctive way to represent a Finder in the User Interface. Each view is defined by the Finder Result Form specified in the view.

Field Summary
 String resultFormName
          READONLY: get the search result form that appears in the search result section of the Finder Form.
 MetadataUserInterface resultUI
          READONLY: Get the search result form UI.
 String searchFormName
          READONLY: Get the search form that appears in the search input section of the Finder Form.
 com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean searchImmediately
          READONLY: Indicate if the search operation is auto executed the first time finder is loaded.
 MetadataUserInterface searchUI
          READONLY: Get the search form UI.
 com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean showSearchForm
          READONLY: Indicate if the search form will be displayed when the first time finder is loaded.
